lambda traffic_volume: {1: 0.8, 0: 0.15, -1: 0.05} if traffic_volume == 1 else {1: 0.5, 0: 0.4, -1: 0.1} if traffic_volume == 0 else {1: 0.2, 0: 0.5, -1: 0.3}
